item.description:
RSVP REQUIRED FOR ALL ATTENDEES.

SHABBAT DINNER FOR YOUNG ADULTS 20'S-30'S

Dinner for 100 Strangers!!
...
Enjoy a full course dinner; W/ amazing Challah, homemade Gefilte fish, chicken soup W/ Matza balls, etc. etc.

Meet new people while Rabbi Mayshe does some meaningful stand-up between courses, a few Chassidic melodies & Followed by a "Stump the Rabbi "session. Bring a friend & make new ones.
RSVP a must.

7:30 PM Dinner. Preceded by services at 7:00 PM

Cost $18

All First Timers and CHAI club members always FREE.

REGISTER ON OUR WEBSITE HTTP://WWW.GETCHAI.COM/SHABBATDINNER
item.name: YOUNG ADULT SHABBAT DIINER
